textBeforeTable: Citizenship – Fees 1. Citizenship Other applications and services Right of Permanent Residence Fee Applications to remain in Canada as a permanent resident Applications for eTAs, visas and permits Citizenship Most of our applications require you to pay a fee. Information on fees can be found in the application guides. Read about the changes and how they may affect you. Note: New fees to be paid by employers and open work permit applicants are being introduced on February 21, 2015. There is also a new process that employers must follow when hiring Labour Market Impact Assessment-exempt foreign workers.
